languages.text: "В глазах ваших подданных вы уже Вольный Торговец. Время стать им в глазах Императора".

traits.locale_text: "В глазах ваших подданных вы уже Вольный Торговец. Время стать им в глазах Императора".

languages.text: "In the eyes of your subjects, you already are a Rogue Trader. It is now time to become one in the eyes of the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "В глазах ваших подданных вы уже Вольный Торговец. Время стать им в глазах Императора".

"In the eyes of your subjects, you already are a Rogue Trader. It is now time to become one in the eyes of the Emperor."

languages.text: 「臣下の目には、陛下はすでに自由開拓者として映っています。今度は皇帝の目となる時なのです」
languages.original_text: "In the eyes of your subjects, you already are a Rogue Trader. It is now time to become one in the eyes of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「臣下の目には、陛下はすでに自由開拓者として映っています。今度は皇帝の目となる時なのです」

languages.text: “您的臣民早已将您视为行商浪人。现在，您需要向帝皇表明您的忠诚。”
languages.original_text: "In the eyes of your subjects, you already are a Rogue Trader. It is now time to become one in the eyes of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “您的臣民早已将您视为行商浪人。现在，您需要向帝皇表明您的忠诚。”

languages.text: «Ya es Comerciante Independiente por lo que a sus súbditos se refiere. Es hora de serlo ante los ojos del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "In the eyes of your subjects, you already are a Rogue Trader. It is now time to become one in the eyes of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Ya es Comerciante Independiente por lo que a sus súbditos se refiere. Es hora de serlo ante los ojos del Emperador».

languages.text: « Vous êtes déjà {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} aux yeux de vos sujets. Il est temps de le devenir aux yeux de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "In the eyes of your subjects, you already are a Rogue Trader. It is now time to become one in the eyes of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes déjà {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} aux yeux de vos sujets. Il est temps de le devenir aux yeux de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: "In den Augen Eurer Untertanen seid Ihr bereits {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}. Es ist nun an der Zeit, das auch in den Augen des Imperators zu werden."
languages.original_text: "In the eyes of your subjects, you already are a Rogue Trader. It is now time to become one in the eyes of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "In den Augen Eurer Untertanen seid Ihr bereits {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}. Es ist nun an der Zeit, das auch in den Augen des Imperators zu werden."

languages.text: "Tebaanızın gözünde zaten Hür Tacir'siniz. İmparator'un gözünde de olma vaktiniz geldi."
languages.original_text: "In the eyes of your subjects, you already are a Rogue Trader. It is now time to become one in the eyes of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Tebaanızın gözünde zaten Hür Tacir'siniz. İmparator'un da gözüne girme vakti geldi."
